properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 25 at 1:56PM PST until January 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Periods of south winds of 25 to 35 kt are expected
through Wednesday. Wind driven seas will combine with westerly
swell to produce steep to very steep seas of 11 to 13 ft through
Wednesday, peaking at around 14 to 17 ft Sunday night into
Monday. Winds could reach gales of 35 to 40 knots late Sunday
night through Monday.

* WHERE...All areas will be affected by advisory level conditions
through this evening, then by hazardous seas conditions tonight.
All areas will continue to be affected by advisory level
conditions through Wednesday morning, with gales possible north
of Pistol River and beyond 1 to 2 miles from shore, except
closer to shore near capes.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM PST this
evening. For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 7 PM this evening
to 4 AM PST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 4 AM
Sunday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from Sunday
evening through Monday evening.

* IMPACTS...Steep seas will make conditions difficult to hazardous
for small craft. Increasing winds tonight into Sunday will
create very steel seas. Strong winds and very steep seas could
capsize or damage vessels in the Gale Watch area during the
watch period. Low visibility conditions are expected at times.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING
